SELECT q.id qid, q.score qscore, q.tadf qtadf, q.tads qtads, q.tadreason qtadreason, q.tadjianyi qtadjianyi, q.bmi qbmi, q.bmis qbmis, q.scores qscores, q.tadfs qtadfs, q.tadss qtadss, q.tadreasons qtadreasons, q.tadjianyis qtadjianyis, qc.content choicecontent, qp.id qpid, qp.content qpcontent, qp.category qpcategory, qp.img qpimg, qp.if_stop qpifStop FROM qu_question qp, biz_answer b, qu_choice_product q, qu_product_paper p, qu_choice qc WHERE q.choose = b.choice_id AND q.product = p.product AND b.productpaper = p.id AND q.choose=qc.id AND qp.id = b.question_id AND b.fenlei = #{fenlei} and p.id=#{productpaper}
select sum(score) from biz_answer where productpaper=#{productpaper} and fenlei=#{fenlei}
